Taiwan's sovereignty belongs to its people, presidential frontrunner saysTaiwan's sovereignty and independence belong to its people, the frontrunner to be its next president said on Saturday in an often testy debate with the other two candidates dominated by arguments over China and tensions in the Taiwan Strait. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 09:40:11 GMT 4UFH45WMTJONRI6ZILBAKQG7LA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwans-sovereignty-belongs-its-people-presidential-frontrunner-says-2023-12-30/Reuters世界亚太地区
China eases visa application for U.S. touristsChina will simplify visa applications for tourists from the United States from Jan. 1, cutting the documents required, according to a notice on Friday on the website of the Chinese embassy in Washington. Sat, 30 Dec 2023 07:09:10 GMT KJBZ2CDRG5JXVK3K7KHPLECBSE https://www.reuters.com/world/china-eases-visa-application-us-tourists-2023-12-30/Reuters世界
DBS to raise stake in China's Shenzhen BankDBS Group Holdings said on Friday it was raising its stake in China's Shenzhen Rural Commercial Bank in a S$376 million ($284.72 million) deal, as it looks to tap into growing opportunities in the Greater China region. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 14:26:48 GMT AQJCMKLTCRIJ5DNPCGHYOSNLNI https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/dbs-raise-stake-chinas-shenzen-bank-2023-12-29/Reuters市场交易
Xi urges Chinese envoys to create 'diplomatic iron army'Chinese President Xi Jinping on Friday urged Chinese ambassadors to forge a "diplomatic iron army" loyal to the Communist Party, reviving the abrasive "Wolf Warrior" rhetoric propagated by some diplomats as a sign of China's increasingly assertive foreign policy. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 13:30:03 GMT E6PBM2IYCZLTDECY6EBTCI6HTY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/xi-urges-chinese-envoys-create-diplomatic-iron-army-2023-12-29/Laurie Chen世界中国
EDP to buy back 49% stake in 1GW wind portfoliosEnergias de Portugal said on Friday that its renewables unit EDP Renovaveis would buy back a 49% stake in its former wind portfolios in Portugal, Poland and Italy from two ACE funds sponsored by Chinese utility China Three Gorges. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 12:56:50 GMT 6ZDTZFETDNIBXNG5Q4EZAH6EEY https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/edp-buy-back-49-stake-1gw-wind-portfolios-2023-12-29/Reuters市场交易
US wants to contain China's chip industry. This startup shows it won't be easyLast year, a veteran Silicon Valley software executive took the helm of a startup in his native China, company records show. The startup told potential investors it would sell microchip design software that is mostly available from just a handful of large Western companies. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 12:03:41 GMT PQMJHVRKCJKV5CPPWECN3UOR6I https://www.reuters.com/technology/us-wants-contain-chinas-chip-industry-this-startup-shows-it-wont-be-easy-2023-12-29/John Shiffman, Joshua Schneyer技术
Chinese ex-Navy chief, with South China Sea background, named defence ministerChina named former Navy chief Dong Jun as its new defence minister on Friday to replace the last minister who disappeared from public view four months ago. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 10:47:05 GMT IQOLC4JECRJWZGLQXCJS3QPWGY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-appoints-dong-jun-new-defence-minister-state-media-2023-12-29/Yew Lun Tian, Laurie Chen世界中国
JD.com wins antimonopoly lawsuit against AlibabaChinese online retailer JD.com said on Friday that it won a lawsuit against rival Alibaba , which was fined 1 billion yuan ($140.68 million) for monopolistic practices. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 09:21:02 GMT ORQXEFSDTZM53K725E27GQWABU https://www.reuters.com/technology/jdcom-wins-antimonopoly-lawsuit-against-alibaba-2023-12-29/Reuters技术
Nvidia launches new gaming chip for China to comply with US export controlsU.S. chipmaker Nvidia on Thursday launched a modified version of an advanced gaming chip designed to comply with U.S. export controls targeting China. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 07:35:52 GMT 2LTWNZ2Y3RL73D2RB3EWDHJJZY https://www.reuters.com/technology/nvidia-launches-new-gaming-chip-china-comply-with-us-export-controls-2023-12-29/Reuters技术
China's fireworks ban sparks fiery debate ahead of Lunar New YearChinese lawmakers on Friday weighed in on a fiery online debate on whether fireworks should be used to ring in the Lunar New Year in February, saying a total ban on pyrotechnics in the country credited with inventing them would be hard to implement. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 07:28:05 GMT 2MZP74RMNZJJ7BAXHKEIXPKLAI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-fireworks-ban-sparks-fiery-debate-ahead-lunar-new-year-2023-12-29/Reuters世界中国
China's new thirst for coffee spurs cut-throat cafe competitionChinese coffee consumption is growing quickly, spurring cut-throat competition between local and foreign coffee chains that have opened thousands of branded shops in recent months and surpassed the number of coffee stores in the United States. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 06:04:56 GMT U4O3SQIW2ZMZ7IJLK7R35RG77U https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/chinas-new-thirst-coffee-spurs-cut-throat-cafe-competition-2023-12-29/Casey Hall, Marcelo Teixeira市场商品
